org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.spi.commit

Interface Validator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Editor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MoveValidator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConflictValidator, CrossMountReferenceValidator, DefaultMoveValidator, DefaultValidator, FailingValidator, MoveDetector, SubtreeExcludingValidator, SubtreeValidator, VisibleValidator

    public interface Validator
extends Editor
    Content change validator. An instance of this interface is used to validate changes against a specific NodeState.
    See Also:
    Commit validators
